name: Relative Tracer
desc: When an enemy target is afflicted with "Suspicion," Freeze, or DoT states, there is a 150% base chance of Blasting the state to adjacent targets. When there are no adjacent targets, the state is Blasted to the original target. Each state can only be Blasted by the same target once in a single action. When one enemy target has Blasted a total of 20 time(s) or is defeated, deals Ice DMG equal to 1200% base DMG to that target and adjacent targets, with a 60% base chance to inflict Frozen that lasts for 1 turn(s).
